comment._content: Here is a Google Satellite View of the current bridge in Tours-sur-Marne.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This is a cropped version of the Agence Meurisse photo on the Gallica site, which bears the caption: "Pont de tours-sur-Marne détruit par les Allemands : le Génie français construisant un pont de fortune" [Tours-sur-Marne bridge destroyed by the Germans: French engineers construct a makeshift bridge] Pub. Date 1914, gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b9041880h
